page.title: 09FESTIVALS
page.content: Some villages have their own festival.{Shavington Village Festival has been going since 1976 and has never stopped or missed a year.The Festival orginally began celebrating the Queens Silver Jubilee and has continiued ever since.The Festival contains a procession of floats,a band and the cubs,scouts and brownies march as well.During the Festival clubs and organisations set up stalls and tents to raise money for their cause.This takes place on the local school field. This needs careful organisation by the {Village Festival Committee. Since 1979,The Village Festival Committee have also organised a Pantomime at Christmas time.This amateur production is performed by local people who make their own costumes and scenery.All this work is done in spare time.{BY EMMA & MICHELLE
